# AFASTGRok MESH
### Planetary-Scale Decentralized AI Video Delivery Network

> "Turn 1.3 billion idle devices into a 6+ exabyte ocean for AI-generated video."

**Vision**  
Solve the impossible scaling problem of generative video by caching encrypted chunks on ISP routers, recycled phones, and user devices â€” globally, instantly, and sustainably.

**Current Status**  
- 25-page Technical White Paper released  
- Tokenomics ($MESH) designed  
- Rust + libp2p node spec ready  
- ISP partnership playbook included
